trans-unit.source: Measurements are recorded in the Measurement page, accessed from the cc|project menu by clicking Construction > Processing > Measurement Recording. Click New to create a new card or Edit to review an existing measurement recording.

seg-source.mrk: Measurements are recorded in the Measurement page, accessed from the cc|project menu by clicking Construction > Processing > Measurement Recording.
Click New to create a new card or Edit to review an existing measurement recording.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Documents can also be created directly from a Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Documents can also be created directly from a Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: The fields in the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for the Measurement Recording.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier for the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current status of the Measurement Recording. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the current status of the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Recorded – The measurement recording is in progress and can be edited.

seg-source.mrk: Recorded – The measurement recording is in progress and can be edited.

trans-unit.source: Registered – The measurement recording has been registered and cannot be edited.

seg-source.mrk: Registered – The measurement recording has been registered and cannot be edited.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date the Measurement Recording was created.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the date the Measurement Recording was created.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the job to which the Measurement Recording applies.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the job to which the Measurement Recording applies.

trans-unit.source: Displays the description of the selected Job No.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the description of the selected Job No.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the user who is responsible for the Measurement Recording; defaults from the Job if one exists.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the user who is responsible for the Measurement Recording; defaults from the Job if one exists.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date of the Measurement Recording.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the date of the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the page number of the Measurement Recording.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the page number of the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the level of the Measurement Recording.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the level of the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location of the Measurement Recording.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the location of the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the user who created the Measurement Recording.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the user who created the Measurement Recording.

trans-unit.source: Displays the total amount (in local currency) of the Measurement Lines.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the total amount (in local currency) of the Measurement Lines.

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date of the Measurement Recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the date of the Measurement Recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the page number of the Measurement Recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the page number of the Measurement Recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the job to which the Measurement Recording line applies. This field is defaulted from the General FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the job to which the Measurement Recording line applies.
This field is defaulted from the General FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the BoQ Position to which the measurement is recorded.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the BoQ Position to which the measurement is recorded.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the quantity of the BoQ Position.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the quantity of the BoQ Position.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the description of the BoQ Position.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the description of the BoQ Position.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the quantity to be measured.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the quantity to be measured.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the cumulative quantity to be measured.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the cumulative quantity to be measured.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Unit Price of the BoQ Position based on Sales Order or BoQ Position, depending on the setting in the Jobs Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Unit Price of the BoQ Position based on Sales Order or BoQ Position, depending on the setting in the Jobs Setup page.

trans-unit.source: Displays the calculated Line Amount of the measurement line.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the calculated Line Amount of the measurement line.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Line Discount % of the BoQ Position based on Sales Order or BoQ Position, depending on the setting in the Jobs Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Line Discount % of the BoQ Position based on Sales Order or BoQ Position, depending on the setting in the Jobs Setup page.

trans-unit.source: Displays the calculated Line Discount Amount of the measurement line.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the calculated Line Discount Amount of the measurement line.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the level of the measurement recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the level of the measurement recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location of the measurement recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the location of the measurement recording line; can be defaulted from the General FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the unique identifier of the BoQ Position.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the unique identifier of the BoQ Position.

trans-unit.source: The actions on the Navigate tab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The actions on the Navigate tab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Measurement List page, which displays the BoQ that contains recorded and registered measurements.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Measurement List page, which displays the BoQ that contains recorded and registered measurements.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Position Card page for the selected measurement recording line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Position Card page for the selected measurement recording line.

trans-unit.source: This action is also available from the Lines FastTab (Line > Position Card).

seg-source.mrk: This action is also available from the Lines FastTab (Line > Position Card).

trans-unit.source: The actions on the Actions tab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The actions on the Actions tab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Changes the measurement status from Recorded to Registered.

seg-source.mrk: Changes the measurement status from Recorded to Registered.

trans-unit.source: Transfers the BoQ Quantity to the Quantity field in the measurement lines.

seg-source.mrk: Transfers the BoQ Quantity to the Quantity field in the measurement lines.

trans-unit.source: Clears the Quantity field in the measurement lines.

seg-source.mrk: Clears the Quantity field in the measurement lines.

trans-unit.source: Creates measurement lines based on the complete BoQ.

seg-source.mrk: Creates measurement lines based on the complete BoQ.

trans-unit.source: Deletes all measurement lines that have an empty Quantity field.

seg-source.mrk: Deletes all measurement lines that have an empty Quantity field.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Measurement Report that is defined in the Jobs Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Measurement Report that is defined in the Jobs Setup page.
